I love this site!

Silly, yet clever and funny. Probably helps if you have some interest in typography, and know that Bembo is a font. The sound-effects add to it.
amazing example of flash animation using text
Fun for adults, but even more excellent to experience with a little kid learning the ABC's.

notes.note: preschool onlnine book
giggle. too cute -- typographic illustrations of animals
只用二十六个英文字母就创造出了一个趣味盎然的动物世界，所有动物都极其巧妙的由其英文名字的字母构成，而且所有的字母只采用了Bembo Roman这一种字体，变化无穷，令人眼花缭乱。
A flash picture book. fun for Lucy?
animal letter sounds and shapes
Alphabet letters linked to animals - but the animal images are created from the letters themselves

This is a great website for younger kids, probably grades PreK-1st or 2nd. It comes up with a page of the alphabet. Students can click on each letter of the alphabet and then a animal whose name starts with that letter will come up. Then the students will hear the sound that animal makes. Last, from the letters that make up that animal's name a picture of that animal will pop up made entirely of the letters that spell the name of the animal. This is a really fun way for children to learn the letters of the alphabet while furthering their vocabulary of zoo animals. Fun and interactive.
Interactive letters that change into animals.
Click on any letter of the alphabet, and the letters of the animal selected to match that letter will animate and rearrange themselves to form the animal shape. Great audio, great interactive!
Great for 5th grade lettering lesson
animals made with letterforms.
using typo to draw animals in flash
All of the animals are made with the letters in its name. Kids will love it.
Alphabet animals made from the Bembo font's letterforms, animated in Flash.
Fun with typography!
Quand les letres s'animent pour devenir animaux. En anglais mais beaucoup de mots similaires.
A web-based abecedary - charming
Flash movie designed as promotion for the book - "a story featuring a menagerie of animals made from Bembo type characters." Much fun!

notes.note: Online Privacy, Privacy Policy, Privacy Statement, Web site Trust

TRUSTe helps consumers and businesses identify trustworthy online organizations through its Web Privacy Seal, Email Privacy Seal and Trusted Download Programs. TRUSTe resolves thousands of individual privacy disputes every year.
org for privacy
Case Studies
TRUSTe, an independent non-profit organization, which provides a privacy seal to websites adhering to privacy principles.

TRUSTe, the online privacy leader, is an independent nonprofit which certifies thousands of web sites to strict privacy standards and resolves thousands of consumer privacy complaints every year through our online Watchdog dispute resolution system.

reviews.review: From the page: "The Selected Civil War Photographs Collection contains 1,118 photographs. "
Military history. Photography. American Civil War. US History.
From the page: "The Selected Civil War Photographs Collection contains 1,118 photographs. "

notes.note: Lynell Burmark: Civil War photos
photos
More, MORE, & More Civil War Photo;s

The Selected Civil War Photographs Collection contains 1,118 photographs. Most of the images were made under the supervision of Mathew B. Brady, and include scenes of military personnel, preparations for battle, and battle after-effects. The collection also includes portraits of both Confederate and Union officers, and a selection of enlisted men.
Amazing photography with a searchable database
from the American Memory project of the Library of Congress
Civil War photographs of the Library of Congress
This Library of Congress site contains more than just pictures of the Civil War; it is a gateway to search all of the collections available through the American Memories section.

National business news

bizjournals is the online media division of American City Business Journals, the nation's largest publisher of metropolitan business newspapers. It operates the Web sites for each of the company's 41 print business journals and operates a web-only site with local business news and information for Los Angeles.
Selected weekly articles from the print versions of these magazines plus daily web content, covering business news from more than 40 US cities

reviews.review: I love Dark Horizon, its a compilation of a bunch of rumor sites. Almost no useless info like a lot of the other sites.
Interesting movie/tv site.
Great Movie Site.
One of the best movie, news, and trailer databases anywhere. Have used it for years.

About the site: "Dark Horizons has been the pioneer movie website for over eight years. Dark Horizons has been an industry leader in the field of online film journalism and a valuable resource for both moviegoers and filmmakers alike."
Discovered this while following a link reporting that the cult TV series "The Prisoner" is going to be remade. Appears to concentrate on sci-fi,horror and fantasy.
I've visited this web site for years now. He has great information on upcoming films, some pretty reliable reviews, and links to the best teasers and trailers. Enjoy!
The site is gorgeous and easy to navigate, with trailers, reviews, and photos galore. Includes photos of upcoming "X3" characters.
